descriptions: Introducing the FIONOUT Banana Duck Plush Pillow! Made with high-quality squisy plush and filled with PP cotton, this soft and skin-friendly duck pillow is perfect for cuddling. Its adorkable banana shape and lovely duck face and feet will bring a smile to your face and add a touch of fun to your daily life. Available in two sizes, 50cm/19.6in and 70cm/27.5in, this cute plushie is suitable for both home and office use. Not just a throw pillow, it can also be used as a decorative piece for your bedroom. Whether as a sleeping partner or a gift for Christmas, birthdays, or Valentine's Day, this cute stuffed duck is sure to be a hit. Don't miss out on the chance to express your love with this lovely and irresistible banana duck plush toy!
